fields.summary: WebViews events are not works in android

comments.body:
{html}

There is a beforeload event in iPhone. There may be others.

{html}

{html}

I want to open pdf on webview .Pls suggest.
I am getting Error 401 while loading url on webview android.

{html}

{html}

@krati this is not the support forum. Please do not post questions here. Go to Q&A on the developer website.

{html}

{html}

(from [0b0328c15cd4fde434002b721b94e55a1682ccb2]) [#553 status:fixed-in-qa] Support beforeload event. http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/0b0328c15cd4f...

{html}

While there is indeed a 'load' and 'beforeload' event now since the fix, there is no 'error' event in TiWebViewClient.java

This had be flummoxed for ages and is a definite and urgent requirement.
